RelatedSentence: THE City Government of Davao has allocated around P30 million for the rehabilitation of drainage systems in Barangays 22 , 23 and 37 - B .
Jimlani said Mayor Rodrigo Duterte requested P30 million from third district Representative Isidro Ungab and the regional office of the the Department of Public Works and Highways for the project .
Jimlani said Mayor Rodrigo Duterte requested P30 million from third district Representative Isidro Ungab and the regional office of the the Department of Public Works and Highways for the project .
He said they are eyeing to begin the rehabilitation in Barangays 22 and 23 , which share a drainage system , as soon as the mayor approves the request for the demolition of houses near the drainage .
